title: In prayer when 2 seek refuge in Allah from satan when standing or sitting & with any form of waswas?
transcript: Abu from Bangladesh he says while having Whispers In Salat we were taught by the prophet Alam that one has to seek refuge in Allah three times from shatan and then spit to his left or be beneath his foot left foot so is this only when standing the answer is no this is throughout the prayer you usually but standing is the most appropriate position to do it in or when you're sitting down if you're in sujud this is not applicable so is this with any type of Whispers or overwhelming Whispers no it is with overwhelming Whispers because Normal Whispers come and go we're talking about something that is persistent something that is continuous something that is bugging you and impacting negatively your prayer this is when you do it and Allah knows best and
